sentences.en: A style consultant will demonstrate how to dress to impress.
sentences.cn: 时尚顾问将示范如何穿着以给人留下深刻印象。

sentences.en: He flew the prototype to West Raynham to demonstrate it to a group of senior officers.
sentences.cn: 他将原型空运到西雷纳姆，向一批高级军官作演示。

sentences.en: He has demonstrated an ability to meet deadlines.
sentences.cn: 他展示了如期完成任务的能力。

sentences.en: He used a set of apparatus to demonstrate that water is made of hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.cn: 他用一套仪器示教,水为氢和氧所合成.

sentences.en: In May of that year, Wilbur sailed to France to demonstrate their new Type A Flyer.
sentences.cn: 那年5月, 威尔伯乘船到法国展示他们新型的“A型飞行器”.

sentences.en: In one town, all the women were urged to remove their money from the banks on an allotted day, to demonstrate women's financial muscle.
sentences.cn: 在某市，所有的女性都被建议在指定日期从银行取走她们的钱，以展示女性群体的经济实力。

sentences.en: Instructors should demonstrate new movements before letting the class try them.
sentences.cn: 教练应该先进行示范，再让全班学生去做新的动作。

sentences.en: Let me demonstrate this car to you.
sentences.cn: 让我先给你们操演一下如何驾驶这部车子.

sentences.en: Let me demonstrate to you how this machine works.
sentences.cn: 我给你演示一下这台机器的运转情况.

sentences.en: My assistant will now demonstrate the machine in action.
sentences.cn: 现在我的助手将演示机器运转情况。

sentences.en: New to the job, he was keen to demonstrate his sureness of mind.
sentences.cn: 刚接触这份工作，他急于展示自己的聪明才智。

sentences.en: Supporters demonstrated outside the courtroom during the trial.
sentences.cn: 审判期间，支持者们在法庭外示威。

sentences.en: The best and the brightest pupils competed to demonstrate their intellectual prowess.
sentences.cn: 最出色、最聪明的学生们竞相展示他们的才智。

sentences.en: The government now has an opportunity to demonstrate its commitment to reform.
sentences.cn: 政府现在有机会表明改革的决心了。

sentences.en: The numbers also demonstrate that intermarriage is on the rise.
sentences.cn: 数据还表明异族婚姻呈上升趋势.

sentences.en: The study demonstrates the link between poverty and malnutrition.
sentences.cn: 这项研究证明了贫困与营养不良之间的联系。

sentences.en: The third law of motion is easy to demonstrate.
sentences.cn: 第三运动定律是容易示证的.

sentences.en: These designs demonstrate her unerring eye for colour and detail.
sentences.cn: 这些设计体现了她对颜色和细节的精准眼光。

sentences.en: These magnificent ancient buildings demonstrate the great intelligence of the labouring people.
sentences.cn: 这些壮丽的古代建筑显示了劳动人民的高度智慧.

sentences.en: You can demonstrate Newton's third law of motion with a garden hose.
sentences.cn: 你可以用一根浇花使用的胶皮软管来说明牛顿的第三运动定律.

words.tran_cn: 说明的；证明的；公开表露感情的
示威者；论证者；指示者；证明者

trans.tran_cn: 证明，说明，(游行)示威，演示
trans.tran_en: to show or prove something clearly
to protest or support something in public with a lot of other people

trans.tran_cn: 示范；论证，证明；说明，演示；显示，表露
trans.tran_en: to show or prove something clearly
